body:
"There's a lot to unpack here" and other things that theorists can't stop saying.

Anyway, here's the theory. She got an ad for a strange and sketchy dating sim the night before. She downloaded it out of boredom and maxed out her charisma stat with 1337 gamer skills before her computer shut down started spamming pop ups because she bought a sketchy ass game from an ad on a hentai site. Obviously the main point though is that her maxed charisma stat became her reality and her computer deleted it's own system 32 because it was a stupid idea to trust a random ad for a game that no one had ever heard of.

But that's just a theory, a hentai theory.
That reference was forced and my execution should soon be scheduled at your leisure.

if this fantia or pixiv I'd like to pay it but this is fucking porn site who serves free stuff, its just like winrar notify me when trials is over. @Paul Vazo I know your pain, even I live in low literacy country, not much translated manga on bookstore and bookstore itself is takes of 2 hour of driving. my lazy ass body bothered with that.
"You can pay for the manga from this link", yeah, that doesn't sound fishy at all

Absolutely hilarious! It's as if poor Kuro has fallen into some sort of Twilight Zone type of curse, where some poorly planned wish has turned her life into a specific tailored hell.  That said, what a tasty variety of high quality pantsu!
Nice comment section, very wholesome.
I can smell Tomoko's rotten cooch from the screen
I would gladly pay for it if I didn't live in a third world country where money is harder to get and there weren't any obstacles to get access to good content.

@narcowalrus Imagine being so pathetic in life that you have to write multiple comments, acting like the moral police. If you don't like people getting angry at being told to pay up, then why are you even here, a site that pirates hentai? Get out of this place if it bothers you that much, Christ.
There's no such thing as a free lunch, you idiots. Never forget that.

@PETA That's the biggest reason why I wrote what I wrote all those weeks ago, because I know these people don't really care about the artists behind the art. Some of the comments here prove that exactly: the moment they ask for money, they get all hot and bothered. That's why I believe this site would get little to no traction, if every entry on it was behind a paywall.

@PETA These idiot people don't know anything. They just want to fap, nothing more. Imagine if literally every doujin on this site had to be bought. Virtually nobody would be on this site, and that says more about them than it does about the people making the art they jerk off to. It shows that they don't really care about the artists, and just want something to bust to.
It'd be actually really funny to read a watamote chapter focused on the main cast's panties ngl

I actually wouldn't mind more artists adding PayPal links so I can support the small time artists I like and maybe even get a sequel to things I like out of it. But not this one. Not fappable to me. But again, more artists should add a link at the end of their work.

I mean, the more I see comments like these, the more I wonder if the people who write them actually like anything on this site, let alone jerk off to any of it. There's no way you can be aroused, or at least happy when reading anything on here, when it seems like you're miserable. I don't know how you guys do it.

It must be nice, having the gall to judge other people's life choices from behind a computer screen, as if you're incredibly successful and you've got it all figured out. Pathetic crap like this is why I just read the hentai and stay away from the comments, because I see nothing but the same tired negativity and bullshit that's on literally every other site.
These parodies never fail to entertain
that was a pleasure to read, laughed pretty hard at the first few pages tho lol

“Please pay for the manga”



No, I don’t think I will
Manga is a strong word for this.
It's just panties it's not worth it
I will only pay for manga that I enjoyed fully.
*Angry comment about money stuff*
Basement dwellers talking about real jobs when you guys can barely do any.
Hehehe Kuro is still in denial about her true desires
HAHAHAHAHAHAHA OH NO NO NO OHHOHO YOU WANT ME TO >pay? AHAHAAHAHAHAHA
Oh shit! I illegally read your manga. I'm really sorry. I'll never do it again. I'll try erasing it on my memory.
does anyone in here even know how doujinshi industries work in japan??
>"Please pay for mangas you illegaly read online" >implying that intellectual property is even a real/valid thing How about you get fucked and go read some Kinsella, fucktard?
Pretty gud, a bit disappointed that there is not porn, but still gud.
I want to support but sorry this is not worth my money.
at least Sanada kana had decent amount of supporters from tweeter

imagine being so fucking loser that you start insulting the artist because they want their money....shithead being reading pirated porn for a years and suddenly got triggered when the artist ask for money..support the artist if you want,shut the fuck up if you dont..easy shit...

V There are tons of mediocre artists in the world. It’s like the worst career you can pick next to singing. I commission a lot and even with tipping, the artist I frequent makes $80-100 at best. But she’s married and has other financial support, so she’s one of the lucky ones.
You want money? Get a real fucking job
This was hot af, Good work tbh, even if not much was changing, I liked it a ton

I'm all for supporting artist and their works cause alot of time goes into making good books. But what I'm NOT supporting is shit artist begging for money when they've done nothing deserving of it. And in a fucking parody book no less. Fucking kill yourself
Ehhhhhh???
This is shitty, i humbly refuse
This is official just search the artist on pixiv and you'll be clarify.
wtf 500 books option, he doesn't have 500 books btw.
this guy have guts to do it

I refuse to pay :D
